item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 24, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Wild – A Fast Linker for Linux (107 points | 41 comments)
2. A WebAssembly compiler that fits in a tweet (81 points | 9 comments)
3. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on CS 1.6 UI (139 points | 45 comments)

27. The color and color-patterns of moths and butterflies (1897) (13 points | discuss)

29. Impact of Low Temperatures on the 5nm SRAM Array Size and Performance (35 points | 19 comments)
